part.title: Main
part.ingredient: 2 rosemary sprigs leaves removed and chopped
part.step: Soak lentils in water with a little salt for 6-8 hours. Once soaked crush with your fingers the stock cubes in lentils and stir well.
Place on heat and cook for 20-25 minutes. Add extra water if it becomes dry. Stir occasionally. Once done drain and return to pot.
Meanwhile heat olive oil in a fry pan and cook bacon, until crispy and brown. Add garlic and cook for a further 3-5 minutes.
Add rosemary and cook for a further minute or two. Turn off heat and add dressing and capers.
Stir well then pot into lentils. Add salt and pepper to taste and parsley and stir well.
Serve with crusty bread or as a side.
